content:
I will be joining Georgia Institute of Technology, GA (Georgia Tech) this fall as a Graduate student in Cybersecurity and Privacy. Currently, I am a senior year ECE undergrad with a minor in computing at Manipal Institute of Technology, India. I am currently working as a research intern at the IMDEA Software Institute, Spain as part of my bachelor thesis, supervised by Dr. Juan Caballero and Dr. Srdjan Matic.
My research interests lie broadly in computer security and privacy. Some areas that particularly interest me are network, mobile, and web security and privacy, fingerprinting, and intrusion detection. Currently, I am exploring detection and mitigation of browser fingerprinting techniques.
Outside research, I am also interested in application security (appsec) - penetration testing, full stack web development and cross-platform mobile app development.
Previously, I have worked on:
 Custom Deployable Production Honeypot with Visualisation Dashboard with Prof. Justin Pelletier and Prof. Bill Stackpole @ RIT. ReconAID : Reconnaissance Automation Framework @ C3i Center, IIT Kanpur.  I am always up for collaborations, so if you want to discuss projects that I have worked on or a potential collaboration, feel free to drop a mail.
Reach me at base64decode(a2FydGhpa3JhbWFrcmlzaG5hbjE0QGdtYWlsLmNvbQ==)
summary:
I will be joining Georgia Institute of Technology, GA (Georgia Tech) this fall as a Graduate student in Cybersecurity and Privacy. Currently, I am a senior year ECE undergrad with a minor in computing at Manipal Institute of Technology, India. I am currently working as a research intern at the IMDEA Software Institute, Spain as part of my bachelor thesis, supervised by Dr. Juan Caballero and Dr. Srdjan Matic.
My research interests lie broadly in computer security and privacy.
title: Karthik Ramakrishnan

summary: We propose a ready-to-deploy Intrusion Detection Honeypot that monitors, logs, and notifies the spoof attempts by attackers to break into the system in real-time.
title: Pandora: An IOT based Intrusion Detection Honeypot with Real-time Monitoring

summary: A web application framework built to aid Pentesters by automating the recon process.
title: ReconAID

summary: A Web Application built using Flask to get the marks,attendance and upcoming calendar activities with Captcha bypass from [SLCM Website](https://slcm.manipal.edu/) of MIT Manipal.
title: SLCM API

summary: A light-weight Intrusion Detection Honeypot which when implemented, monitors and spoofs efforts by attackers to gain access to the system.
title: Pandora

summary: A Full Stack Cross Platform Smartphone app to analyse daily carbon footprint consumption.
title: Zeoco

summary: A web application to analyse and depict the performance of any user in games played on chess.com
title: Chess.com Stats Viewer

summary: We propose a mobile application that helps to ease out decision makings on tasks like travel, shopping, electricity consumption, and gain a different and rather numerical perspective over the daily choices.
title: Zeoco: An insight into daily carbon footprint consumption
